Description: Pyra or Mythra must be in the party in order to access excavation point. Excavating requires Earth Mastery Level 7 and Fortitude Level 6. Opening the Treasure Trove requires Lockpicking Level 6 and Ancient Wisdom Level 6.

At this point the quest Adenine's Password must be completed and code must be entered into the glowing tablet. The code is XE36E46S19A3. After the code is entered, all three Morythan Tablets will be removed from the item list.

Remove the seal of Wind from a tiny country blessed by sea breeze. - Located in Godsford Isle in Leftherian Archipelago. It requires Level 7 Wind Mastery and Level 7 Superstrength

Obtain one Ether Bottle - It requires obtaining the Switch Parts 1 info item from the Informant at Goldmouth Flight Deck, then obtaining the item by salvaging at Port Anangham in the Empire of Mor Ardain. The info item can alternatively be obtained from the Three Parts Merc Mission.

Obtain one Key-Shaped Lever - It requires obtaining the Switch Parts 2 info item from the Informant at Garfont Village, then obtaining the item by salvaging at Goldmouth Flight Deck. The info item can alternatively be obtained from the Three Parts Merc Mission

Obtain one Filament Globe - It requires obtaining the Switch Parts 3 info item from the Informant at Fonsa Myma, then obtaining the item by approaching the salvage point at Torigoth Relay Base in Gormott Province and completing the quest Tirkin Suppression. The info item can alternatively be obtained from the Three Parts Merc Mission

Mysterious Part A is in the Hermit's Hollow. The cave entrance is south of Hushview Bridge - Keen Eye Lv2 and Ancient Wisdom Lv2 Field Skills are required to decipher the Torigoth Murals, Earth Mastery Lv5 and Fortitude Lv5 are required to unearth and Lockpicking Lv5 to open the Treasure Trove

The Mor Ardain Murals must be examined in Alba Cavanich before the excavation spot for Mysterious Part B will appear - Keen Eye Lv2 and Ancient Wisdom Lv2 Field Skills are required to decipher the Mor Ardain Murals, Earth Mastery Lv5 and Keen Eye Lv2 are required to unearth and Lockpicking Lv6 to open the Treasure Trove

The Tantalese Murals can be examined in Theosoir for a hint at Mysterious Part C - Keen Eye Lv3 and Ancient Wisdom Lv3 Field Skills are required to decipher the Tantalese Murals, Ice Mastery Lv4 and Fortitude Lv4 are required to unearth and Lockpicking Lv5 to open the Treasure Trove

The Indoline Murals can be examined in the Refugee Campground, or the Leftherian Murals near Corinne's House, for hints at Mysterious Part D - Keen Eye Lv3 and Ancient Wisdom Lv3 Field Skills are required to decipher the Indoline Murals and Leftherian Murals, Dark Mastery Lv4 and Ancient Wisdom Lv2 are required to disperse the Malign Miasma blocking the cave containing the Treasure Trove, Fortitude Lv3 and Keen Eye Lv3 are required to unearth and Lockpicking Lv6 to open the Treasure Trove
Relic-Holder Tyrannor must be defeated in the 7th Division for Mysterious Part F
After gathering every other part, Erebos must be defeated at Tretl Windmill Plaza in Gormott for Mysterious Part E

The following ingredients are required for each batch of 10 cookies - Bright Fig x5, which can be found in the Kingdom of Uraya, including Collection Points at Cobalt Cliffs, Bluestep Ditch, Farlaine Central Pools, and Farlaine Wells.; Sparklesugar x2, which can be purchased at the Honeycomb Sweets run by Bonbon in the Argentum Trade Guild's Goldmouth.; Whisper Tomato x2, which  can be found in the Leftherian Archipelago, in particular the farm north of Corinne's House in Fonsett Village, or from the Collection Point on Isle of Terminomni.; Limdo Flamii Egg x1, which can be dropped by Limdo Flamiis in the Kingdom of Uraya, particularly in the Cleansing Spring, Lake Varna, Eight-Rock Skip and Fonsa Myma Waters.
